docs.title: Welcome to the IFCP wiki!
docs.text: IFCP (Infastucure Communication Protocol) is a TCP-based protocol for communicating between infrastructure and servers.

docs.title: SDKs
docs.text:
We will implement client SDKs (Software Development Kits) so developers don't have to implement them. The following list includes some that we have planned:

  • C# (Planned)
  • Python (Planned)
  • C (Planned)

docs.title: Development Progress
docs.text:
This protocol is a work in progress. Changes will be made, and bugs may occur.

We welcome feedback and suggestions as we continue to improve IFCP.

docs.title: Packet Design
docs.text: Packets are split up into parts. The parts are: - Packet Length - Headers (Metadata and information) - Body (Message or data)
